StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersLogisticalOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Shipyards are, by some measures, the most complicated constructs we have ever created. Any improvements we can make to their management and operations will result in significant cost savings.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersFleetLogisticsTech_Name
StringTable.String: Fleet Logistics

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersFleetLogisticsTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Greatly increases Logistics.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersFleetLogisticsTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Scaling up our naval operations to include large multi-vessel fleets has created a number of additional logistical challenges which we're only just now coming to grips with. We'll definitely stop sending ships out without oxygen now though.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersDeepSpaceLogistics_Name
StringTable.String: Deep Space Logistics

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersDeepSpaceLogistics_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Greatly increases Logistics.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersDeepSpaceLogistics_Dec
StringTable.String: Whether it's via unmanned probes, deep space caches, or our network of merchant vessels, keeping our fleets well stocked while our civilization ever expands has proven to be a tremendous, but still very boring, challenge.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersGalacticLogistics_Name
StringTable.String: Galactic Logistics

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersGalacticLogistics_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Greatly increases Logistics.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersGalacticLogistics_Dec
StringTable.String: Our mastery of mass-scale logistics is the envy of the galaxy. Well. The part of the galaxy which gets excited about logistics that is.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersWarfareTech_Name
StringTable.String: Warfare

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersWarfareTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows research of weapons technologies.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersWarfareTech_Dec
StringTable.String: We can't be naive about what we might find in the galaxy. Or who. From this point on, our ships must be armed, whether to protect against some yet unseen enemy, or even ourselves.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersWeaponsSystemsTech_Name
StringTable.String: Weapons Systems

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersWeaponsSystemsTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of basic weapon systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersWeaponsSystemsTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The best defense is a good offense. Interestingly, so is the best offense. With that in mind, we've developed weapon systems which should prove very well suited to space-based defense. And, as discussed, offense.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersWeaponsSpecializationTech1_Name
StringTable.String: Targeting Specialization

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersWeaponsSpecializationTech1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the Accuracy of all weapon systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersWeaponsSpecializationTech1_Dec
StringTable.String: We have increased the targeting systems of our existing weapons substantially, and what we have learned will apply to future weapons systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersWeaponsSpecializationTech2_Name
StringTable.String: Miniturization Specialization

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersWeaponsSpecializationTech2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the Mass of all weapons systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersWeaponsSpecializationTech2_Dec
StringTable.String: We have reduced the mass of our existing weapons systems, and what we have learned will apply to future weapons as well.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersWeaponsSpecializationTech3_Name
StringTable.String: Production Specialization

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersWeaponsSpecializationTech3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the Cost of all weapons systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersWeaponsSpecializationTech3_Dec
StringTable.String: We have reduced the cost of our existing weapons systems, and what we have learned will apply to future weapons as well.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersBeamWeapons_Name
StringTable.String: Beam Weapons

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersBeamWeapons_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersBeamWeapons_Dec
StringTable.String: Whether energy, particles, or both at the same time, there's an awful lot of destructive potential in suddenly sending a lot of them all at one place.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersBeamWeaponOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Focused Beam Weapons

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersBeamWeaponOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases damage of beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersBeamWeaponOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: A new generation of the ultra transparent materials we use in our focusing crystals has made it possible to increase the damage potential of our beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersBeamWeaponOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Low-Cost Beam Weapons

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersBeamWeaponOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces cost of beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersBeamWeaponOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Beam weapons will never be cheap, but some economies of scale have led to price reductions in the magnification and focusing equipment these weapons rely upon.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersBeamWeaponOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Beam Weapons Miniaturization

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersBeamWeaponOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces mass of beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersBeamWeaponOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Lacking the requirements for ammunition storage, beam weapons have always been mass-efficient. And after some hard work by the boys and girls in the lab, now they're more so.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersMatterDisruption_Name
StringTable.String: Matter Disruption

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersMatterDisruption_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersMatterDisruption_Dec
StringTable.String: Our researchers have been able to weaponize a columnated beam of particles capable of disrupting the strong nuclear force, severing the bonds which hold the nucleus together, turning matter into smaller chunks of matter.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersHighEnergyFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Beam Amplification

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersHighEnergyFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases damage of beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersHighEnergyFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: Advances in crystallography have created a new generation of focusing crystals capable of handling much greater quantities of energy without fracturing. All of our beam weapons just got a little bit badder.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersHighEnergyFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Beam Manufacturing Focus

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersHighEnergyFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces cost of beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersHighEnergyFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: For a long time the manufacture of beam weapons was as much art as science, requiring highly trained technicians to individually polish and tune each weapon. By making concentrated efforts to standardize beam weapon manufacturing, we're finally able to automate portions of it, reducing the cost of each unit.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersHighEnergyFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Low Mass Beam Weapons

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersHighEnergyFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces mass of beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersHighEnergyFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: The heaviest parts of beam weapons has always been the charge coils and their associated cooling equipment. But with the latest generation of super-conductors we can now build these smaller and more compact than ever.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersPlasmaProjection_Name
StringTable.String: Plasma Projection

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersPlasmaProjection_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersPlasmaProjection_Dec
StringTable.String: Thanks to a breakthrough in containment technology, we're now able to generate columnated plasma containment fields at incredible distances. The upshot to this is that we can now send massive quantities of plasma at relativistic velocities in the direction of anything we don't like very much.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersBeamWeaponMastery1_Name
StringTable.String: Master Beam Assembly

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersBeamWeaponMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces cost of beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersBeamWeaponMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: Our supply chain for the creation of plasma containment fields had a couple of kinks that needed to get worked out, but now that we have, we expect to be able to create beam weapons for far less resources.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersBeamWeaponMastery2_Name
StringTable.String: High Density Beam Weapons

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersBeamWeaponMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces mass of beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersBeamWeaponMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: We're now able to push our beam weapons right up to the limits that physics allow. If we want any more power per unit of mass, we may have to move to a different universe.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersEnergyPhasing_Name
StringTable.String: Energy Phasing

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersEnergyPhasing_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of devastating beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersEnergyPhasing_Dec
StringTable.String: The phaser particle is almost impossible to understand if you don't have several advanced degrees and possibly an extra brain. In short, these particles can induce a chain reaction that breaks an enemy down into neutrinos, effectively evaporating it.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersDoomRayTech_Name
StringTable.String: Doom Ray

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersDoomRayTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersDoomRayTech_Dec
StringTable.String: An adaptation of the phaser particle emitter has resulted in massive improvements in the induced matter-breakdown reaction, making it effective against even the highest density armor. Also of note, our scientists are pretty sure the reaction won't consume the entire universe, so feel free to continue deploying it as you see fit.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersBeamWeaponAugmentation_Name
StringTable.String: Beam Weapon Augmentation

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersBeamWeaponAugmentation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of beam support systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersBeamWeaponAugmentation_Dec
StringTable.String: Our beam weapons use a variety of systems to accumulate energy prior to the weapon firing. We've found that the capacity of these energy storage systems can be augmented by an external field, which although expensive, allows for increased beam output. Most interestingly, such fields can be theoretically projected at great distances, potentially improving the beam output of an entire fleet.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersHighEnergyTransfer_Name
StringTable.String: High Energy Transfer

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersHighEnergyTransfer_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved beam support systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersHighEnergyTransfer_Dec
StringTable.String: After considerable study in the way that our beam weapons interact on a subatomic level with both shield systems and hulls, we've developed systems capable of reducing the effectiveness of enemy shields, or absorbing enemy beam attacks on our own vessels.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersHighEnergyMagnification_Name
StringTable.String: High Energy Magnification

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersHighEnergyMagnification_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced beam support systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersHighEnergyMagnification_Dec
StringTable.String: An improved understanding of the effects our beam augmentation fields have has resulted in the possibility of even greater beam outputs. Our beam weapons have that funny smell again, but we don't hear many crew members complaining.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersMissileWeapons_Name
StringTable.String: Missile Weapons

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersMissileWeapons_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersMissileWeapons_Dec
StringTable.String: Conceptually simple, though there's no shame in that, missile-based weapons provide a tremendous amount of punch for their cost.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersMissileOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Rapid Fire Missiles

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersMissileOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases firing speed of missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersMissileOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Our weapons engineers have determined that shooting more missiles at things makes them blow up faster. Which seems obvious in retrospect. Anyways, our missile launchers shoot more now.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersMissileOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Low Cost Missiles

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersMissileOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces cost of missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersMissileOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Missiles were always going to be the most cost-effective means of making things hurt, and now they're a little bit more so.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersMissileOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Missile Miniaturization

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersMissileOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces mass of missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersMissileOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Reviews of training data and engagement encounters reveals one overriding request from the field. "We want more missiles. Give us more missiles." Well, having reduced the mass of our launchers and ammunition racks, we're now able to do just that.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersHarpoonTech_Name
StringTable.String: Harpoons

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersHarpoonTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersHarpoonTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The Harpoon class of missiles employ a number of improvements in speed, range, tracking, and warhead yield, resulting in our most powerful conventional missile system yet.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersWarheadFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Warhead Acceleration

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersWarheadFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases range of missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersWarheadFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: More target drones have given their lives for our glory, and a careful analysis of their deaths has revealed some exciting possibilities in the field of shaped charges, which should improve the destructive yield of our warheads.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersWarheadFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Warhead Manufacturing

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersWarheadFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces cost of missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersWarheadFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: The most delicate part of missile manufacturing was the warhead, for obvious reasons. But the latest generation of ultra-stable explosives should reduce both manufacturing costs and workplace accidents significantly.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersWarheadFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Low Mass Warheads

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersWarheadFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces mass of missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersWarheadFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: By using the latest generation of shaped-charge warheads to reduce the weight of each individual missile, with no corresponding loss of destructive power, we can make room for more missile launchers in total.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersPhotonicWarheads_Name
StringTable.String: Photonic Warheads

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersPhotonicWarheads_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersPhotonicWarheads_Dec
StringTable.String: One of the biggest downsides to missile based technology is that much of the energy is expended on the outer surface of enemy vessels. By including with our warheads a device which releases a high energy burst of photons at the moment of impact, we can achieve substantial penetration against both armor and shield systems, greatly increasing the destructive potential of our warheads.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersPayloadMastery1_Name
StringTable.String: Master Missile Assembly

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersPayloadMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces cost of missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersPayloadMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: Our missile manufacturing facilities are now almost perfectly efficient, wasting no material whatsoever. Destruction shouldn't come so cheap, yet here we are.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersPayloadMastery2_Name
StringTable.String: High Density Warheads

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersPayloadMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces mass of missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersPayloadMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: Modeling of the subatomic interactions our warheads make upon detonation against various hull and shield systems have revealed the possibility of making lighter, more efficient warheads

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersPhotonTorpedos_Name
StringTable.String: Photon Torpedos

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersPhotonTorpedos_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of devastating missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersPhotonTorpedos_Dec
StringTable.String: By matching a wide-spectrum version of the photon-encasement armor piercing technology with our latest anti-matter warheads, we've created a weapon with truly colossal damage potential. They glow a new color too.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersNightmareTorpedoTech_Name
StringTable.String: Nightmare Torpedoes

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersNightmareTorpedoTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersNightmareTorpedoTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The Nightmare torpedo contains a tiny singularity trapped in a pocket universe until the moment of impact, which upon being released causes horrifying damage to anything foolish enough to be standing by a place we're firing something called Nightmare torpedoes at.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersMissileAugmentation_Name
StringTable.String: Missile Augmentation

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersMissileAugmentation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of missile support systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersMissileAugmentation_Dec
StringTable.String: Our weapons researchers have come up with a number of ship or starbase based sensor systems which can improve the tracking, and ultimately the range of our missiles.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersAdvancedMissileGuidance_Name
StringTable.String: Advanced Missile Guidance

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersAdvancedMissileGuidance_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved missile support systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersAdvancedMissileGuidance_Dec
StringTable.String: Improved decoy and camouflage systems will greatly increase the survivability of our missiles when faced with point defenses. And our missile support modules now feature a number of predictive systems which should help missile range even more.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersIntelligentWarheads_Name
StringTable.String: Intelligent Warheads

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersIntelligentWarheads_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced missile support systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersIntelligentWarheads_Dec
StringTable.String: Cluster warheads are capable of overwhelming and neutralizing enemy point defense systems. And our fleet-based guidance systems, along with the latest generation of information-sharing "pilot" missiles, will allow for even more efficient guidance and improved range.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersKineticWeapons_Name
StringTable.String: Kinetic Weapons

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersKineticWeapons_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersKineticWeapons_Dec
StringTable.String: There's just something nice and honest about a projectile, isn't there? And thanks to a little help from teams of massive electromagnets, we've now got some extremely fast projectiles to work with.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersKineticOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Kinetic Range Extention

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersKineticOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases range of kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersKineticOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: A switch to slightly smaller projectiles, along with improved energy delivery systems, has led to significant improvements in the speed of each projectile, and thus the effective range of each unit.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersKineticOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Kinetic Weapon Manufacturing

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersKineticOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces cost of kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersKineticOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Never before have we needed to make electromagnetic coils in such quantities, and the early days of kinetic weapons were plagued by supply-chain problems. But supply has finally ramped up to meet demand, and we should see cost savings across all associated kinetic weapons programs.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersKineticOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Kinetic Miniaturization

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersKineticOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces mass of kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersKineticOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Some experimentation with the winding patterns of our electromagnetic coils has revealed a number of subtle synergistic effects which we can take advantage of, leading to tighter, more compact coils, and ultimately, lower mass weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersPulseCannonTech_Name
StringTable.String: Pulse Cannons

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersPulseCannonTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersPulseCannonTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Research efforts to emit tight clusters of particles at rapid velocities have led to a weapon which gets around some of the practical limitations of slug based mass drivers. Called pulse cannons, they have similar tactical characteristics as previous generations of kinetic weapons. They're just much more powerful.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersKineticAccelerationFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Frictionless Acceleration

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersKineticAccelerationFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases range of kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersKineticAccelerationFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: The latest generation of superconductors have enabled us to deliver energy to our weapon systems much more rapidly. The trade off is smaller projectiles, though as they'll be launched at higher velocities, the destructive potential will be similar, and the weapons will have a much longer effective range.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersKineticAccelerationFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Low Cost Accelerators

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersKineticAccelerationFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces cost of kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersKineticAccelerationFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: The latest generation of superconducting electromagnetic coils, and their less-strenuous cooling requirements, make them much less fragile to handle. We expect to see significant cost savings now that we won't break as many during production.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersKineticAccelerationFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Low Mass Accelerators

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersKineticAccelerationFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces mass of kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersKineticAccelerationFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: Our new ultra-low resistance electromagnets generate a lot more kick per unit weight, leading to lower mass accelerators. So feel free to cram more of them into whatever you're cramming them into.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersGravitonThrower_Name
StringTable.String: Graviton Thrower

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersGravitonThrower_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersGravitonThrower_Dec
StringTable.String: By synthesizing and launching pulses of gravitons at the enemy, we can induce massive shifts in the local gravity of the ship systems they strike. This will cause incredible amounts of damage, and probably make anyone standing nearby feel really dizzy. Before they die.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersKineticMastery1_Name
StringTable.String: Master Accelerator Assembly

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersKineticMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces cost of kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersKineticMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: "We Make Kinetic Weapons Faster," is probably the dumbest slogan ever conceived of, but the factory workers seem really proud of it, so no-one had the heart to tell them. And to be fair, they do make them really quite quickly now.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersKineticMastery2_Name
StringTable.String: High Density Accelerators

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersKineticMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces mass of kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersKineticMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: Our scientists have all but mastered kinetic weapons, and are approaching the limits of the field, making them as mass efficient as theoretically possible.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersQuantumDrivers_Name
StringTable.String: Quantum Drivers

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersQuantumDrivers_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of devastating kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersQuantumDrivers_Dec
StringTable.String: Quantum drivers fire shells which contain small quantum fields which, on impact, pull in a tremendous amount of mass from a neighboring dimension. We're not sure which dimension and can only hope that they didn't need that mass.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersSingularityDrivers_Name
StringTable.String: Singularity Drivers

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersSingularityDrivers_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersSingularityDrivers_Dec
StringTable.String: The pinnacle of kinetic weapon technology, these launch micro singularities that collapse into existence shortly after impact. These are bad news, the worst news really, for anyone who can't get out of the way.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersKineticAugmentation_Name
StringTable.String: Kinetic Augmentation

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersKineticAugmentation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of kinetic support systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersKineticAugmentation_Dec
StringTable.String: Inertial dampening should be impossible in this universe, which is why we were a little surprised we were able to pull it off. We've used this stroke of luck to create systems which can boost the velocity and effective range of our kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersMassManipulation_Name
StringTable.String: Mass Manipulation

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersMassManipulation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved kinetic support systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersMassManipulation_Dec
StringTable.String: We can now embed inertial modification tech inside projectiles, allowing them to generate ultra-dense outer surfaces for a brief period to improve their armor penetrating capabilities. And our kinetic augmentation systems have gotten a bit better.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersInertialMagnification_Name
StringTable.String: Inertial Magnification

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersInertialMagnification_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced kinetic support systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersInertialMagnification_Dec
StringTable.String: Our projectiles are now capable of attacking armor directly, creating low density fissures that can cause the whole structure to splinter. Additionally our kinetic augmentation systems have increased their range boosting effects yet again.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersMilitarizationTech_Name
StringTable.String: Militarization

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersMilitarizationTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of military shipyards and defense platforms.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersMilitarizationTech_Dec
StringTable.String: We already have a significant amount of structures in orbit and on the ground, all of which can now be militarized with modest extra investment and some new uniforms.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersMilitarySpecialization1_Name
StringTable.String: Enhanced Training

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersMilitarySpecialization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves soldier effectiveness.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersMilitarySpecialization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Our military's regular training exercises are beginning to pay off, and we can now expect our soldiers to be far more effective when conducting ground-based operations.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersMilitarySpecialization2_Name
StringTable.String: Defensive Fortifications

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersMilitarySpecialization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves planetary defense.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersMilitarySpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: We can't assume that our space-based defenses will always be effective. Hardening our ground fortifications and preparing plans for rapidly forming colonist militias will make our worlds significantly more secure.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersMilitarySpecialization3_Name
StringTable.String: Resistance Forces

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersMilitarySpecialization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase our colonies ability to resist invaders.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersMilitarySpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: By training our population in basic resistance tactics, we can help them be ready for anything. A prepared population can often be the difference between victory and defeat when invaded.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersPlanetaryInvasion_Name
StringTable.String: Planetary Invasion

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersPlanetaryInvasion_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows transport modules to be constructed.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersPlanetaryInvasion_Dec
StringTable.String: We've developed the equipment and tactics necessary to land on a world and take it by force. We are now the alien invaders.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersInvasionOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Planetary Bombardment

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersInvasionOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows Planetary Bombardments to be conducted during invasions.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersInvasionOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: So it turns out that thanks to the properties of mass, the easiest way to pacify something is to just drop something on it. It takes a bit of practice to get right, but the practice is fun too.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersInvasionOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Information Warfare

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersInvasionOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows Informational Warfare tactics to be used during invasions.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersInvasionOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Information warfare lacks a certain visceral appeal, but by using EMP's and targeted hacking attacks, we can cripple an enemy's coordination abilities, dramatically limiting the effectiveness of their defenses. If they want to keep fighting after that, then it can get visceral.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersInvasionOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Biological Warfare

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersInvasionOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows Biological Warfare tactics to be used during invasions.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersInvasionOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Let's be honest with ourselves. If we're now the alien invaders, there's no reason we have to be nice about it. Yes we'll have to live with the consequences of our actions. But at least we'll be the ones who live.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersStallerMarines_Name
StringTable.String: Stellar Marines

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersStallerMarines_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves soldier effectiveness and transport capacity.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersStallerMarines_Dec
StringTable.String: A greater understanding of the tactics and training required for effective ground-based combat has led to a new form of military unit which specializes in establishing beachheads in unfriendly gravity wells.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersGravitationalFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Tidal Disruption

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersGravitationalFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows tidal disruption tactics to be used during invasions.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersGravitationalFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: By directing powerful gravitational fields at enemy ground defenses, we can induce flooding and even tectonic activity. The ground shall quake beneath our enemy's feet or feet-analogs.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersGravitationalFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Core Detonation

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersGravitationalFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows core detonation tactics to be used during invasions.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersGravitationalFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: Inducing a planet to suddenly experience massive, worldwide volcanic activity is a pretty extreme step. That said, it certainly will pacify any defenders. Also liquefy them.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersDroneSoldiers_Name
StringTable.String: Drone Soldiers

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersDroneSoldiers_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves soldier effectiveness and transport capacity.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersDroneSoldiers_Dec
StringTable.String: There are massive benefits in unit reliability and coordination if our troops are programmed to unfailingly do what we tell them to. And we won't have to feel so bad about losing these ones.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersAdvancedInvasionTactics_Name
StringTable.String: Advanced Invasion Tactics

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersAdvancedInvasionTactics_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves soldier effectiveness and allows construction of advanced transports.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersAdvancedInvasionTactics_Dec
StringTable.String: A new generation of invasion transports, along with a new generation of soldiers that don't mind being stacked like firewood, allows us to put boots on the ground faster than ever.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersFortification_Name
StringTable.String: Fortification

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersFortification_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of defensive fortifications, and improves planetary defense.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersFortification_Dec
StringTable.String: We mustn't neglect our own defenses, and with the latest generation of defensive fortifications, our planets and starbases will be able to put up a much tougher fight.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersDefensiveFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Bombardment Shelters

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersDefensiveFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Makes all colonies Immune to Planetary Bombardment.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersDefensiveFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: By moving our most critical structures underground, and providing similar shelters for civilians and troops, we can dramatically limit the effectiveness of most forms of orbital bombardment.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersDefensiveFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Information Systems Hardening

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersDefensiveFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Makes all colonies Immune to Information Warfare.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersDefensiveFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: Our defensive experts have identified a number of vulnerabilities in our CC systems, and urgently recommend that we harden them.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersDefensiveFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Adaptive Vaccinations

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersDefensiveFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Makes all colonies Immune to Biological Warfare.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersDefensiveFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: It's impossible to predict the form of biological attack an alien invader could inflict upon us, making it impossible to conventionally vaccinate against. Thus we've developed adaptive vaccines, which are engineered virus that cycle through a number of semi-random stages in an attempt to expose a body's immune system to as broad a range of infection types as possible.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersOrbitalDefencePlatform_Name
StringTable.String: Orbital Defense Platform

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersOrbitalDefencePlatform_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Adds defensive fighters to orbit, improves planetary defense.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersOrbitalDefencePlatform_Dec
StringTable.String: A dedicated orbital defense platform will provide an additional layer of defense for our planetary systems, and take some of the pressure off of our starbases in orbit.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersPlanetaryDefenseDome_Name
StringTable.String: Planetary Defense Dome

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersPlanetaryDefenseDome_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of planetary defense dome, improves planetary defense.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersPlanetaryDefenseDome_Dec
StringTable.String: With the resources and energy available to ground-based structures, we're now able to construct a defensive dome with so many layers of redundancy that it's effectively invulnerable to any orbital bombardment.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersDefenseSystemTech_Name
StringTable.String: Defense Systems

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersDefenseSystemTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of basic defensive systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersDefenseSystemTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Naval officers are notoriously squishy, and otherwise difficult to protect in a ship that operates in hard vacuum. But we've got to try, otherwise the squishy officers will stop getting in to the ships.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersDefensiveSpecialization1_Name
StringTable.String: Shield Specialization

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersDefensiveSpecialization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces cost of shields.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersDefensiveSpecialization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Deflecting or diffusing incoming weapon fire is really, really hard, and we're far from having a really good understanding of it. Our latest round of research has only succeeded in making existing systems a bit cheaper to build.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersDefensiveSpecialization2_Name
StringTable.String: Point Defense Specialization

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersDefensiveSpecialization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces cost of point defenses.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersDefensiveSpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Making our point defenses fire more crap into the space around the ship is a simple solution to a complicated question. Though a surprisingly effective one.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersDefensiveSpecialization3_Name
StringTable.String: Armor Specialization

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersDefensiveSpecialization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces mass of armor.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersDefensiveSpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: By adjusting the size and positioning of our armor panels, we've been able to minimize overlap and other inefficiencies, and can now provide the same level of protection to our ships for less overall weight.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersShieldSystems_Name
StringTable.String: Shield Systems

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersShieldSystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved shield systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersShieldSystems_Dec
StringTable.String: No longer must our ships cower behind crude deflector fields. The latest generation of shields, although expensive, are capable of stopping incoming attacks outright, rather than just deflecting or diffusing their impact.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersShieldOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Shield Enhancment

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersShieldOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases shield strength.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersShieldOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Of all the suggestions we've received from the field on how to improve our shield systems, "Please make them bigger," seemed to be their most common. So we've done that.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersShieldOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Low Cost Shield Systems

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersShieldOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces shield cost.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersShieldOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: We probably shouldn't talk in front of the troops about our efforts to make our shield systems cheaper, even if it means more shields to go around for everyone. Because that's not how they'll see it.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersShieldOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Shield Miniaturization

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersShieldOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces shield mass.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersShieldOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: The first few generation of field emitters used in our shield systems were incredibly bulky and cumbersome. And they still are, frankly. Just a bit less so now.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersBarrierFieldGeneration_Name
StringTable.String: Barrier Field Generation

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersBarrierFieldGeneration_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced shield systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersBarrierFieldGeneration_Dec
StringTable.String: The latest generation of shielding technology, the so called Barrier Field, provides a number of improvements over previous systems. Now capable of absorbing a portion of the energy which strikes it, this dramatically increases the energy efficiency of the system, allowing for ultimately much more powerful shields.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersBarrierSystemFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: High Output Shield Generators

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersBarrierSystemFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases shield strength.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersBarrierSystemFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: The first generation of energy absorbers in our Barrier Field systems used a model of capacitor which occasionally exploded violently. Crews had decidedly mixed feelings about this, so we replaced those capacitors with a slightly more robust model.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersBarrierSystemFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Low Cost Shield Generators

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersBarrierSystemFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces shield cost.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersBarrierSystemFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: After the first few prototypes went out the door, we've been able to achieve some economies of scale in the manufacture of our Barrier Field systems, reducing the cost of shield components.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersBarrierSystemFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Low Mass Shield Generators

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersBarrierSystemFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces shield mass.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersBarrierSystemFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: We've recently been able to shave a ton of weight off our shield generators thanks to the latest generation of superconductors and their less extensive cooling requirements.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersForceFieldTech_Name
StringTable.String: Force Fields

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersForceFieldTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic shield systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersForceFieldTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The latest generation of shields are capable of directing vast amounts of additional energy to a specific section of shields within nanoseconds of the moment of impact, allowing for shields which are much stronger relative to their respective weight.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersShieldMastery1_Name
StringTable.String: Master Shield Assembly

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersShieldMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces shield cost.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersShieldMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: Cheaper shields never meant less effective shields, and it's only taken a few decades for our troops to finally understand that. Which is good, because our shields are spectacularly cheap now.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersShieldMastery2_Name
StringTable.String: High Density Shield Generators

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersShieldMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces shield mass.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersShieldMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: It's impossible to make the energy emitters of our shields any denser, our engineers now claim. They claim that kind of thing a lot and always take it back later, but they seem pretty sure this time

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersInvulnerabilityTech_Name
StringTable.String: Invulnerability

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersInvulnerabilityTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate shield systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersInvulnerabilityTech_Dec
StringTable.String: "Invulnerable" may be a bit of an exaggeration. Our researchers allow that some theoretical weapons could penetrate these shields. But those would be some pretty terrifying weapons, and even then you'd rather be behind this shield than not.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersShieldSupportSystems_Name
StringTable.String: Shield Support Systems

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersShieldSupportSystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of shield support systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersShieldSupportSystems_Dec
StringTable.String: Advances in the focusing capabilities of our shield generators has given us the ability to generate and augment shields at a distance. This should provide massive tactical and strategic options for fleet operations.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersShieldAugmentation_Name
StringTable.String: Shield Augmentation

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersShieldAugmentation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved shield support systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersShieldAugmentation_Dec
StringTable.String: The same technology we've used to generate shields at a distance can now be done with our Barrier Field systems, allowing for even greater improvements in fleet survivability.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersEnergyFieldManipulation_Name
StringTable.String: Energy Field Manipulation

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersEnergyFieldManipulation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced shield support systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersEnergyFieldManipulation_Dec
StringTable.String: Our mastery of the energy fields needed to create and maintain shields has resulted in a couple interesting new technologies, capable of interfering with enemy shield systems, or massively shielding friendly units within range.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersPointDefenses_Name
StringTable.String: Point Defenses

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersPointDefenses_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of point defense systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersPointDefenses_Dec
StringTable.String: An array of tiny computer controlled railguns that track and destroy incoming missiles, point defense systems are unparalleled at protecting ships and starbases from missile attacks, though still aren't terribly helpful at defending against other classes of weapons.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersPointDefenseOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Smart Point Defenses

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersPointDefenseOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases point defense strength.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersPointDefenseOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: A careful analysis of various missile performance envelopes has led us to adjust the firing patterns of our point defense systems, which should make them more effective.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersPointDefenseOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Low Cost Point Defenses

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersPointDefenseOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces point defense cost.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersPointDefenseOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: The sensor and tracking equipment our point defense systems use are fairly specialized pieces of equipment that were initially quite rare and costly. Now that we've dedicated a lot of effort to building point defenses, the price of those systems is starting to come down.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersPointDefenseOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Point Defense Miniaturization

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersPointDefenseOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces point defense mass.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersPointDefenseOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: The slugs fired by point defenses don't need to be large, and were limited by the fact that we could only build railguns so small. But now that we can build more compact railguns, we should see significant weight savings for all our point defense systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersCounterMeasures_Name
StringTable.String: Counter Measures

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersCounterMeasures_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced point defense systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersCounterMeasures_Dec
StringTable.String: By deploying electronic counter measures which interfere with and confuse incoming missile attacks, we've greatly increased the survivability of our ships and starbases. Against missiles at least. Hard to confuse a laser.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersCounterMeasureFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Adaptive Counter Measures

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersCounterMeasureFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases point defense strength.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersCounterMeasureFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: There's always a generational game of leap frog being played between missile designers and ECM designers, but we believe our latest algorithms have given us the leg up on the bad guys this time

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersCounterMeasureFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Counter Measure Manufacturing

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersCounterMeasureFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces point defense cost.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersCounterMeasureFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: Our earliest attempts at ECM suites were heavily customizable, requiring a great deal of hand tuning to get to perform. Now that we know what works, we can automate much more of the manufacturing and installation process.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersCounterMeasureFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Low Mass Counter Measures

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersCounterMeasureFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces point defense mass.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersCounterMeasureFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: Our first ECM suites were cobbled together from a half dozen different processors and transmitters. We've since streamlined those into a single unit which weighs much less.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersDroneSentrySystems_Name
StringTable.String: Drone Sentry Systems

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersDroneSentrySystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic point defense systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersDroneSentrySystems_Dec
StringTable.String: By installing our point defense systems on drone platforms that orbit our ships at a distance, we add a valuable extra layer of protection against missile attacks.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersDroneSystemMastery1_Name
StringTable.String: Master Point Defense Assembly

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersDroneSystemMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces point defense cost.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersDroneSystemMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: To be fair, only a few of our drone systems have ever actually shot each other in combat situations. But by minimizing that just a little more, we should be able to make our point defenses a little more cost-effective, albeit less funny.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersDroneSystemMastery2_Name
StringTable.String: High Density Point Defenses

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersDroneSystemMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces point defense mass.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersDroneSystemMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: Once we realized point defense drones don't need much personal space, we were able to start packing them in a lot tighter.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersArreonMissileDefenseTech_Name
StringTable.String: Arreon Missile Defense

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersArreonMissileDefenseTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate point defense systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersArreonMissileDefenseTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The ultimate in point defense technology, featuring the latest generation of micro-drones, armed with railguns, ECM and smart chafe, capable of filling the space around a ship with a cloud of debris so thick no enemy missiles are likely to survive.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersPointDefenseSupportSystem_Name
StringTable.String: Point Defense Support

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersPointDefenseSupportSystem_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of point defense support systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersPointDefenseSupportSystem_Dec
StringTable.String: Our experience working with small scale point defenses has led to a type of long range missile tracking system which should enhance the point defense capabilities of an entire fleet.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersPointDefenseAugmentation_Name
StringTable.String: Point Defense Augmentation

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersPointDefenseAugmentation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved point defense support systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersPointDefenseAugmentation_Dec
StringTable.String: Wide area missile disruptors enhance the effectiveness of our existing counter measures, adding a much needed layer of extra missile security to entire fleets.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersPointDefenseManipulation_Name
StringTable.String: Point Defense Manipulation

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersPointDefenseManipulation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced point defense support systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersPointDefenseManipulation_Dec
StringTable.String: Our mastery of point defense technologies has led to the development of fleet-wide drone systems. Additionally, our fleets can now be equipped with point defense disruptors, essentially a type of counter-counter-measure, which should greatly boost the effectiveness of our own missile attacks.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersArmorSystems_Name
StringTable.String: Armor Systems

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersArmorSystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved armor systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersArmorSystems_Dec
StringTable.String: A big lump of ultra-dense material remains an effective, if unsubtle, method of protection from modern space-based weaponry.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersArmorOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Reinforced Armor

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersArmorOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases armor strength.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersArmorOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: A simple mistake by one of our fabricators resulted in a set of armor panels marginally denser and more resilient than we'd seen before. It took us a long time to replicate that mistake, but now that we have, our ships should be a little tougher to kill.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersArmorOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Low-Cost Armor

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersArmorOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces armor cost.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersArmorOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: One of the biggest challenges with armor manufacturing was simply the logistics of moving rare and heavy resources and materials around. Now that we've got our supply chain sorted out, we can expect to see some nice cost savings.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersArmorOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Armor Miniaturization

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersArmorOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces armor mass.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersArmorOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: By its very nature, armor is always going to be a fairly mass-intensive way of protection. That said, we can do a few things to improve the precision and fit of armor plating, which should cut down on weight a bit.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersDurantiumCompositeTech_Name
StringTable.String: Durantium Composite

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersDurantiumCompositeTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced armor systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersDurantiumCompositeTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Experiments have revealed that when certain materials are stacked in specific arrangements, they have a synergistic effect on the strength of their neighbors when exposed to compressive forces, which greatly magnifies their damage absorption potential. We call these new composites Durantium, and they should tremendously increase the survivability of our ships.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersArmorFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Armor Lamination

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersArmorFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases armor strength.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersArmorFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: A careful study of some battle-damaged ships has revealed previously unknown weaknesses in our armor systems. Basically, we know why some of them were cracking in half now. We'll do something about that right away.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersArmorFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Armor Manufacturing Focus

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersArmorFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces armor cost.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersArmorFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: If the troops ask, it's not that our armor is now cheap. It's that we've found a more efficient way of manufacturing it. But yes, it is pretty cheap.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersArmorFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Armor Mass Reduction

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersArmorFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces armor mass.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersArmorFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: Some experiments with the arrangement of our Durantium composites has revealed that we can get away with slightly less dense materials at certain layers with no impact to the armor's effectiveness.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersKanviumLaminateTech_Name
StringTable.String: Kanvium Laminate

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersKanviumLaminateTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic armor systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersKanviumLaminateTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Kanvium armor systems use a new type of lamination which, upon impact, causes surrounding materials to partially fluidize, deforming to absorb energy, but in a recoverable way. Impacts are spread out over a much larger area, increasing the effectiveness of the armor. After the impact, the armor flows back into its original shape, minimizing the risk posed by repeat hits.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersArmorMastery1_Name
StringTable.String: Master Armorers

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersArmorMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces armor cost.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersArmorMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: With modern armoring systems, the design of the armor informs the shape of the ship as much as the other way around, and properly armoring a ship is a complicated trade off between armorer and ship designer. It's an art essentially, and it's one that we have mastered.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersArmorMastery2_Name
StringTable.String: High Density Armor

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersArmorMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces armor mass.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersArmorMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: We've created and shredded countless generations of armor, and worn out entire test ranges with our target practice. On a weight basis, our armor systems are now as efficient as they can possibly be.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersZeroPointArmorTech_Name
StringTable.String: Zero Point Armor

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersZeroPointArmorTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate armor systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersZeroPointArmorTech_Dec
StringTable.String: We have a hard time proving zero point armor even exists, only knowing of it by the effect it has. It appears to tap into the zero-point energy of the quantum vacuum to repulse incoming energy. It's almost impossibly tough, we can prove that much.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersArmorSupportSystems_Name
StringTable.String: Armor Support Systems

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersArmorSupportSystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of armor support systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersArmorSupportSystems_Dec
StringTable.String: In the factory, we've begun producing armor plating with a variety of force field based technologies. By adapting these fields into ship modules, we can create a hardening effect at a distance, making every ship in a fleet substantially more durable.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersArmorEnhancement_Name
StringTable.String: Armor Enhancement

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersArmorEnhancement_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved armor support systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersArmorEnhancement_Dec
StringTable.String: The fields that we use to generate hardening effects at a distance have twenty seven different "poles" which can be cycled repeatedly through, changing the alignment of the hardening effects in the affected material, generating substantially stronger, more resilient materials.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersIntegrityFieldProjection_Name
StringTable.String: Integrity Field Projection

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersIntegrityFieldProjection_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced armor support systems.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersIntegrityFieldProjection_Dec
StringTable.String: Our latest generation of armoring fields no longer just generate hardening effects at a distance, but can now induce material fluidization and shape recovery effects as well. These new Integrity Fields can make every ship in a fleet invulnerable to all but the most powerful attacks.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersCommunicationsTech_Name
StringTable.String: Communications

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersCommunicationsTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows research of communications technologies.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersCommunicationsTech_Dec
StringTable.String: We've already seen glimpses of evidence that we're not alone in this galaxy. This presents an incredible danger to us, but also perhaps an opportunity. But also, let's stress again, danger.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersTranslatorTech_Name
StringTable.String: Universal Translator

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersTranslatorTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Can begin communicating with aliens. Boosts diplomacy.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersTranslatorTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Intense study of the fragments of alien text and speech has allowed us to create a Universal Translator that will let us communicate with any new races we come across.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersDiplomaticSpecialization1_Name
StringTable.String: Diplomatic Reasoning

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersDiplomaticSpecialization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Diplomacy.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersDiplomaticSpecialization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Our increased exposure to alien cultures has given us the opportunity to simulate several different rhetorical and diplomatic approaches when dealing with them, revealing several ways to improve their attitudes towards us. Our roleplaying has enabled us to talk prettier, essentially.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersDiplomaticSpecialization2_Name
StringTable.String: Influential Voice

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersDiplomaticSpecialization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Influence.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersDiplomaticSpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Our culture has a way of communicating what our diplomats cannot, and by increasing the ease with which other civilizations can access our culture, we can win hearts and minds before we even get to the negotiating table.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersDiplomaticSpecialization3_Name
StringTable.String: Passionate Communicator

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersDiplomaticSpecialization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Get better deals when trading with other races.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersDiplomaticSpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: The way we see the universe doesn't have to be unique to us. By clearly communicating our thinking to outside parties, they may begin seeing same way as us, and even help make this the universe that we want to see.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersInterstellarGovernance_Name
StringTable.String: Interstellar Governance

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersInterstellarGovernance_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of Stellar Empire form of government.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersInterstellarGovernance_Dec
StringTable.String: Governing a civilization whose distant outposts are many weeks of travel away isn't a new challenge for us, paralleling our experience exploring our own world hundreds of years ago. But it's a field we're having to refamiliarize ourselves with pretty quickly, before we get any space tea dumped in one of our harbors.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersPoliticalSpecialization1_Name
StringTable.String: Federalist Party

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersPoliticalSpecialization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of Federalist Party.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersPoliticalSpecialization1_Dec
StringTable.String: The Federalist method of organization features a relatively weak central government with much of the power and responsibility offloaded to lower, more local governmental groups. This bias towards local regulation seems to encourage economic development.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersPoliticalSpecialization2_Name
StringTable.String: Populist Party

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersPoliticalSpecialization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of Populist Party.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersPoliticalSpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Populist forms of government are designed to make people happy, albeit at the cost of having the most effective policies. As a side-effect of this relentless interest in pleasing others, Populist governments are often very good at diplomacy.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersPoliticalSpecialization3_Name
StringTable.String: Universalist Party

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersPoliticalSpecialization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of Universalist Party.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersPoliticalSpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Universalist governments attempt to be all things to all people. In a galaxy-spanning civilization, that can be a lot of people, none of whom agree on anything. Still, a balanced approach like this at least ensures a government has no weak spots.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersGalacticGovernance_Name
StringTable.String: Galactic Governance

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersGalacticGovernance_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of Galactic Republic form of government.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersGalacticGovernance_Dec
StringTable.String: By granting limited powers of self rule to various elements of society, reserving the most critical functions for our own central government, we expect to see increased public satisfaction and more trite political slogans.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersPoliticalFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Industrialist Party

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersPoliticalFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of Industrialist Party.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersPoliticalFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: Industrialist governments seek to maximize industrial capacity by rewarding citizens based entirely on their productivity. From top to bottom, society is organized to encourage hard work and not having fun.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersPoliticalFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Mercantile Party

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersPoliticalFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of Mercantile Party.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersPoliticalFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: Mercantilists seek to ensure their civilization's prosperity through trade, via careful negotiations, hard-earned intelligence, or brutally unfair tariffs. The exposure their traders have with other civilizations also gives them a unique advantage at espionage.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersPoliticalFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Technologist Party

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersPoliticalFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of Technologist Party.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersPoliticalFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: Technologists understand that throughout history, any time two civilizations have met, the less technologically advanced one has come out very poorly from the encounter. By dedicating all their effort and resources to R & D, Technologists hope to never be that dumber civilization.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersInterstellarDemocracyTech_Name
StringTable.String: Interstellar Democracy

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersInterstellarDemocracyTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of Interstellar Democracy form of government.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersInterstellarDemocracyTech_Dec
StringTable.String: A system which lets people pick their own rulers, or at least think they're picking their own rulers, has been one of the crowning achievements of political theory. Adapting it to a galaxy-spanning civilization has posed a number of challenges - the campaign trail is now rather long - but the increase in public satisfaction and market certainty will certainly be worth it.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersPoliticalMastery1_Name
StringTable.String: War Party

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersPoliticalMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of War Party.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersPoliticalMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: Whether it's because they consider all other civilizations to be inferior, or are simply terrified of them, the War Party is willing to put their entire civilization on a military footing to do something about it.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersPoliticalMastery2_Name
StringTable.String: Pacifist Party

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersPoliticalMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of Pacifist Party.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersPoliticalMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: Pacifist governments forego the language of aggression and militarization, and focus all their efforts on promoting culture and social welfare. This makes them well liked in the galactic community, and their words travel far.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersStarFederationTech_Name
StringTable.String: Star Federation

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersStarFederationTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of Star Federation form of government.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersStarFederationTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The ultimate in space based governance, an ideal blend of all the freedoms, responsibilities, and delicious seasonings which make up an ideal civic life.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersDiplomacyTech_Name
StringTable.String: Diplomacy

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersDiplomacyTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of embassies and the formation of basic treaties.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersDiplomacyTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The potential for profit that an alliance with our neighbors could bring is something we should always consider. And failing that, the cost of talking with them will be a fraction of the cost of going to war with then.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersDiplomaticOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Economic Treaty

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersDiplomaticOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows formation of economic treaties.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersDiplomaticOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Economic treaties will lower tariffs and other obstacles that discourage business activities. When well designed, these treaties should result in increased wealth for both parties.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersDiplomaticOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Cultural Treaty

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersDiplomaticOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows formation of cultural treaties.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersDiplomaticOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: By increasing the interchange of cultural products and making it easier for civilians to cross borders, we can hope to increase the influence we have on our neighbors.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersDiplomaticOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Research Treaty

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersDiplomaticOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows formation of research treaties.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersDiplomaticOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: By entering into formal information sharing agreements with other civilizations, our researchers can more easily accumulate the masses of data which modern research often requires.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersInterstellarAlliances_Name
StringTable.String: Interstellar Alliances

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersInterstellarAlliances_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved diplomatic buildings. Increases Diplomacy.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersInterstellarAlliances_Dec
StringTable.String: The process of turning a friendly species into a formal ally is a supremely delicate one. There's only one way those talks can go right, and a thousand different ways they can go wrong. The etiquette of alien handshakes alone is fraught with peril.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersAllianceFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Military Alliance

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersAllianceFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows formation of military alliances.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersAllianceFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: By forming formal military alliances with our friends, our civilization will be that much more imposing to our enemies. The trade-off is that we now risk being drawn into wars not of our own choosing. Friends are cheap to have, but allies can be very expensive indeed.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersAllianceFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Technological Alliance

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersAllianceFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows formation of technological alliances.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersAllianceFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: A formal technological alliance will dramatically ramp up the research information sharing programs we have with our ally. This is valuable information we're sharing, so we must be sure of their friendship before entering such an agreement.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersAllianceFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Cultural Alliance

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersAllianceFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows formation of cultural alliances.

StringTable.Label: Snathi_PeacekeepersAllianceFocus3_Dec
